dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Olefin production capacity is 800,000 tons/year. The specific process of coal-to-olefins is as follows: (1) Provide oxygen and nitrogen to all devices in the plant through the air separation unit. (2) Raw coal undergoes, coal grinding, and coal gasification to produce crude synthesis gas; (3) Co-Mo series sulfur-resistant partial conversion process, low-temperature methanol washing, and sulfur recovery (oxygen-enriched two-stage Claus + hydrogenation Reduction absorption + alkali washing) treatment releases net synthesis gas, and the by-product is liquid sulfur; (4) net synthesis gas generates methanol through Lurgi low-pressure methanol synthesis technology, single-column methanol rectification, and hydrogen recovery (membrane separation device PSA series technology) (5) Finally, methanol is used as raw material to produce propylene and ethylene through MTO technology, olefin separation and olefin cracking (LORP and OCP technology), and simultaneously produce by-product liquefied petroleum gas, C5 and gasoline.

烯烃产能为80万吨/年。煤制烯烃具体工艺如下：(1)通过空分装置为全场各装置提供氧气，氮气。(2)原料煤经过、磨煤、煤气化制取粗合成气；(3)再经过Co-Mo系耐硫部分变换工艺、低温甲醇洗、硫回收(富氧两级克劳斯+加氢还原吸收+碱洗)处理释放出净合成气，副产品为液硫；(4)净合成气通过鲁奇低压甲醇合成技术、单塔甲醇精馏、氢回收(膜分离装置PSA串联技术)生成甲醇；(5)最后以甲醇为原料经过MTO技术、烯烃分离和烯烃裂解(LORP和OCP技术)生产丙烯和乙烯，同时生产副产液化石油气、C5和汽油。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: A functional unit is defined as 1 ton of propylene product

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The case is selected from the joint venture project between China Power Investment Corporation and Total Group. The project was built in 2016 and is located in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, which is rich in coal resources, with an olefin production capacity of 800,000 tons per year.
案例选自中国电力投资集团公司与道达尔集团的合资项目。该项目建于2016年，位于自煤炭资源丰富的内蒙古自治区，烯烃产能为80万吨/年。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: 丙烯烃利用及其产品的报废处理以及基础设施建设和以及设备维护不在本次评价边界范围之内。项目输入消耗包括原料(煤)、能源(电、蒸汽、新鲜水、空气)以及辅料(氢氧化钠等)。本项目考虑了原料的运输过程，该煤化工厂地理位置毗邻煤矿厂，距离约为330km，其中铁路距离为300km，公路运输距离30km。

The utilization of propylene and the end-of-life treatment of its products, as well as infrastructure construction and equipment maintenance are outside the scope of this assessment. Project input consumption includes raw materials (coal), energy (electricity, steam, fresh water, air) and auxiliary materials (sodium hydroxide, etc.). This project considers the transportation process of raw materials. The location of the coal chemical plant is adjacent to the coal mine, with a distance of about 330km, of which the railway distance is 300km and the road transportation distance is 30km.
